header.headertext: AMENDMENT TO BE MOVED IN GRAND COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: After Clause 88, insert the following new Clause—
text.IndentOne: In section 11 of the Landlord and Tenant Act 1985 (repairing obligations in short leases), after subsection (1)(c), insert—
“(d) if the lessor is informed that a child will be resident in the dwelling-house, to keep in repair and proper working order a smoke alarm”.”
